email_content.body: Your latest credit card statement is now available online. To ensure your account security, please review your transactions and report any discrepancies.
paragraphs: As part of our commitment to keeping your finances safe, we encourage you to enable two-factor authentication if you haven't already.
To view your statement, click the secure link below. If you have any concerns, please contact our customer service at 1-800-432-3117 or visit your local branch.

email_header.subject: Your Chase Credit Card Statement is Ready

explanations.explanation: The sender's address (customer.service@chase.com) matches Chase's official domain‚Äînice and consistent!

TLS encryption is enabled, ensuring your data is safely transmitted.
